additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Glycerin, Sorbitol, PEG-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Myristoyl Sarcosinate, Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Trideceth Sulfate, Panthenol*, Carnosine, Salicylic Acid, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Fragrance, PEG-100, Lauric Acid, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-10, Cocamide MEA, Disodium EDTA, Laureth-10, BHT, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone,*Pro-Vitamin B5

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Wet face with warm water. gently massage product over face. rinse with clean water. for best results, follow with an olay regenerist moisturizer. Avoid contact with eyes. if contact occurs, rinse well with water

description: Olay Regenerist Detoxifying Pore Scrub Cleanser
